attributes.action: Reduce and refund University tuition fees nationwide
attributes.additional_details: Our quality of teaching has not been sufficient in any way, shape, or form in comparison to what universities offered pre-Covid. More importantly our mental health across our age group has been massively affected and we want recognition that we, as the next generation, will be the ones that sort this mess out and repay the money spent by the government. On top of that students will have their loans to pay back - which were spent on botched university experiences and degrees.
attributes.background:
Reduce and refund all University tuition fees to cover all term time affected from April 2020 to present day due to Covid-19.
Students have not been given sufficient resources and teaching during the course of Covid-19. I demand that something is done.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762

Require universities to fully refund tuition fees for the Autumn term: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555583

Lower university tuition fees for students until online teaching ends: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911

Government subsidise this year's university tuition fees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552814

Refund ALL University student tuition fees due to lack of quality in education: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555516

Reduce student loan debts by the cost of all tuition fees paid during Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560953
